description: Video footage taken in eastern China emerged yesterday showing 43-year-old Song Tao inserting buttons into his eyes and lifting the two buckets of water using a rope
title: Chinese acrobat lifts 22-lb water buckets by his eyelids
title_page: Chinese acrobat lifts 22-lb water buckets by his eyelids | Daily Mail Online
text:
This is an incredible moment when a man lifts buckets with 22 pounds of water using just his eyelids.
Video footage taken in eastern China emerged yesterday showing 43-year-old Song Tao inserting buttons into his eyes and lifting the two buckets of water using a rope.
His act was nominated in the provincial intangible cultural heritage list of Shandong Province in 2007.
Song Tao, 43, can lift up two buckets of water weighing 22 pounds using only his eyelids
A teacher once taught him to practise by inserting a button into his eye before going to bed
Song performed in Guangxi province as a dancer before learning this act.
He told reporters that a teacher told him to put a button into his eyes every night before sleep as practice.
His first performance was in 1991 and all he needs is a rope with two buttons tied to one end and hooks tied at the other end.
'I sterilise the buttons every time before a performance, so I won't get infections in my eyes,' said Song.
Song also sterilised the coin-size button every time before performances to prevent infection
Do not follow! Putting buttons inside his eyes can be painful and makes his eyes water
His bizarre act was in Shandong's provincial intangible cultural heritage list in 2007
The acrobat told the reporters that putting buttons inside his eyes can be painful and makes his eyes water.
'Please do not follow this act at home, this is dangerous if you have not practised properly or under supervision,' he added.
According to Guinness World Records, Satyajit Hota from Turkey held a record of heaviest weight lifted with one eyelid in 2013.
A video showed him achieving a weight lift of 3.40 kg (7 lb 8 oz) on the set of an Italian television programme 'Lo Show dei Record' in March 2012.
